26/07/2022
Please revise your DMP according to the feedback in the attached file.
It is also a good idea to already consider which repositories to use for data sharing. EMBL-EBI has many good repositories for biomedical work for example: (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/). These repositories also add metadata and reading the submission guidelines  may help you to decide which metadata to collect along with your experiments. For data for which there is no disciplinary repository you can use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr).
If you have any further questions, or if you like to schedule a meeting to discuss your DMP, please contact onderzoek2bergen@kuleuven.be
Good luck with your project!
